channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Building robots can be a pain: 6 reasons you should let someone else do it
item.description: Spencer Krause and the team at SKA Robotics offer insights on the common pitfalls that in-house robotics teams often face. The post Building robots ca...

item.title: Why businesses judge AI like humans — and what that means for adoption
item.description: Enterprises adopting AI aren’t just signing a “utility contract” for revenue growth; they’re entering an “emotional contract.”

item.title: Kollmorgen releases SFD-M high-resolution encoder with multi-turn absolute feedback
item.description: Designed to work with AKD and AKD2G drives, the SFD-M absolute multi-turn encoder can be integrated into Kollmorgen-housed servo motors. The post Koll...

item.title: Credit where credit’s due: Inside Experian’s AI framework that’s changing financial access
item.description: Experian's enterprise AI framework offers valuable lessons for businesses seeking to scale beyond proof of concept.

item.title: New approach to agent reliability, AgentSpec, forces agents to follow rules
item.description: Researchers from Singapore Management University developed a new domain-specific language for agents to remain reliable.

item.title: Researchers warn of ‘catastrophic overtraining’ in LLMs
item.description: The researchers compared two versions of OLMo-1b: one pre-trained on 2.3 trillion tokens and another on 3 trillion tokens.
